response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and relevance to your business, we believe it would significantly contribute to your success. We are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the market value and the benefits it offers. We understand the importance of making a decision that aligns with your financial planning, so please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing value to your operations.", "product_price": 750000}
